channel.title: Can someone give me some advice, please?
channel.description:
Hey,
I want to make a private server, and with make I mean, change alot of things. But I want to make some kind of "skilling" area for my server. Like, a small place where you can train every non-combat skill and with a bank in it. I know how to add a bank but I don't know how to add the other things.
But my actual question is, Does anyone know a source and client to start with? Something where i can add these features without issues. I worked with PI but I wanna try something else, like delta. (I want the old RS graphics)
Thnx!

item.title: Can someone give me some advice, please?
item.dc:creator: @stfupls stfupls
item.description:
@stfupls wrote:

[quote=“Derpington, post:1, topic:431427”]Thanks, i decided to just move on with the PI i used, i downloaded some clean sources but i just dont have the knowledge yet to add skills myself
I downloaded a list of object ID’s also
I’m currently adding mining rocks to my home :3[/quote]
Ah good job fine to hear

i also trying to get a fresh 317 old rs sourche but i cant find:/

This is my first attempt then to code but i saw some vids etc of it

If u have skype add me: meowdans666 then we can talk around and help each other

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone give me some advice, please?

But I want to make some kind of “skilling” area for my server. Like, a small place where you can train every non-combat skill and with a bank in it.

But my actual question is, Does anyone know a source and client to start with? Something where i can add these features without issues.
I worked with PI but I wanna try something else, like delta. (I want the old RS graphics)

Thnx![/quote]
Well type in google of in search: blank server or 317 server
And youtube & google will help you with code just type: how to code your rsps
Its not hard you get ur coords and u can build there whit the id of the item…
To get the ids go google: rsps all object ids

Read full topic
